properties.address: Culm Valley Methodist Church, Cullompton, Devon EX15 2PL
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 4th January 2024** Every Thursday in January and February 3-5 pm. Warm, fully accessible church hall. Hot drinks and light refreshments. Board games, dominoes and jigsaws. Free WiFi available also off road car parking.
properties.title: Culm Valley Methodist Church

properties.address: Lazenby Road, Tiverton, Devon EX16 4AL EX16 4AL
properties.description: A vibrant and welcoming Community Centre in the Wilcombe area of Tiverton. The Cafe/Bar Area is always available for anyone to come into the warm and use our free public Wi-Fi.
properties.title: Sunningmead Community Centre

properties.description: Public Library with books, wifi, PCs, seating, activities for all, free warm coats rail, community fridge and freezer. Free hot drinks and cakes provided by Rotary Club of Tiverton on Friday mornings through the Winter.
properties.title: Tiverton Library

properties.description: A welcoming comfortable place to be, save on heating at home, find company, things to do and refreshments. Open for everyone without charges, donations welcome.
properties.title: Uffculme Warm Space
